728336f-a.title: Richmond: Androvette Street - Kreischer Street
728336f-a.text:
Androvette Street, south side, west from Kreischer
Street, showing the rears of houses. These were, in all
likelihood,the homes of the workmen of the Kreischer
Brick Company factory, which was nearby. On the extreme,
rlght at the N.W. corner of Kreischer Street,is the
old Neilsen's Hotel, later known as the Four Corners House.
May 3, 1937
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRCDUCCTIONS
